item.description:
We were planning to join an AMC hike this week in Brewster but the rain gods have intervened.  I think we should officially change the Meetup at this point.

Anyone who lives closer to Brewster can always join the AMC hike/picnic at Flax pond in Nickerson State Park if there is an unexpected clearing.

About the Thursday Hiking Club- On Thursdays, a group of us gets together for breakfast and a hike. Sometimes we hike in Myles Standish State Forest. Sometimes we go on one of the AMC hikes. Sometimes we just eat breakfast when it's pouring.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Hiking Club- Hides from the rain
